item.title: Python and Kafka
item.description: The first step is to create an “app” on twitter. https://developer.twitter.com/en/apps And then in your virtualenv, install these dependencies: pip install kafka-python pip install python-twitter pip install tweepy Create a topic. Pick something you are interested in. For example you might want to collect tweets about data-engineering, covid-19, or space travel. Whatever you want :) Write a script that will print tweets to standard out, and also publish them to kafka.
